name: BlueGreenSelection
description: Selects F5 Blue and Green pools by name, attempts to validate their pool members are mutually exclusive, and persists environment variable(s) for use by subsequent tasks.
author: Jason Vercellone

inputs.name: LTMName
inputs.label: IP Address
inputs.helpMarkDown: F5 device name or IP address.

inputs.name: Password
inputs.label: Password
inputs.helpMarkDown: F5 user password. The best practice is to create a variable in the Build or Release definition, and mark it as 'Secret' to secure it, and then use it here, like '$(F5Password)'.

inputs.name: DeviceGroup
inputs.label: Device Group
inputs.helpMarkDown: F5 device group to sync to (optional). *case sensitive*

inputs.name: F5VariablePrefix
inputs.label: Prefix
inputs.helpMarkDown: An optional variable prefix, useful if multiple 'Blue-Green Deployment - Selection' tasks are necessary.

inputs.name: MachineListFormat
inputs.label: Machine format
inputs.helpMarkDown: A machine list value format expression where {0} is ip address, {1} is server name, and {2} is the pool member port number.

inputs.name: ServerListFormat
inputs.label: Server format
inputs.helpMarkDown: A server list value format expression where {0} is ip address, {1} is name, and {2} is the port number of the pool member.
